name: Deja Brew (Liquid Beaver Studios)
description:
Sometimes the hangover just is not worth it... but every weekend for some of us... it happens again and again.  Can you manoeuvre your way to bed through giant obstacles? Probably... but there's a catch!

Treat our friend here as you wish, by breaking as many bones as possible, or a nice peaceful bubble popping journey into bed. Both viable ways to max out your high score and beat your friends!

Download and play Deja Brew now!
